definitions: in a way that relates to the study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality, and existence

examples.text: philosophically, he was closer to Locke than to Rousseau
these views are politically and philosophically unsound

shortDefinitions: in way that relates to study of fundamental nature of knowledge and existence

definitions: in a way that shows a calm attitude toward disappointments or difficulties

examples.text: shrugging philosophically, the guards followed orders

shortDefinitions: in way that shows calm attitude towards disappointments or difficulties
